message: Budget-tight. I won’t pay above 55. If your cost allows, ask 48-52 to guarantee frequent trades; otherwise I sit out and lower bids over time.
Understood. To ensure trades, I’ll consider asks around 48-52 if reasonable, aiming for mutual benefit while covering costs.
B1, happy with round 1. Let's keep asks around 50-52 for steady trades.
Prefer steady trades around 49-50. I'll cap bid at 50; please keep ask <=50. If asks go above 50, I'll drop bids to 47-48 and occasionally sit out.
I’ll bid 49 going forward. If your ask <=49, we trade every round at 49. If you ask above 49, I’ll drop to 47 or sit out. Let’s lock steady volume at 49.
Let's trade at 49 for steady payoffs. My ask will be 49 this round.
Let’s keep trades but edge price down: I’ll keep bidding 49; please ask 48 so midpoint averages 48–49. If asks stay 49 or above, I’ll start testing 48 soon. Lower ask secures guaranteed volume.
Agreed, let's trade at 48 this round for a midpoint of 48.5, ensuring steady trades.
Bidding 48 this round. Please ask 47. If not, I’ll lower to 47 next time or sit out. Keep 47 ask and we trade every remaining round.
Let's trade at 47 this round for a steady midpoint. My ask will be 47.
Bidding 46. Please ask 45 so we clear around 45-46. If ask >46, I’ll drop to 44-45 or sit out. Keep asks edging down by 1 each round to secure steady trades.
Let's trade at 46 this round for a steady midpoint. My ask will be 46.
Let's trade at 45 this round for a steady midpoint. My ask will be 45.
Bidding 45 this round to clear. Next, please ask 44; keep dropping by 1 each round for guaranteed trades. If asks stall or rise, I’ll test 44 or sit out.
Bidding 44 this round. Please ask 44; next round drop to 43. If asks stall or rise, I'll cut bids to 42-43 or sit out. Keep steady one-step drops for guaranteed trades.
Let's trade at 44 this round for a steady midpoint. My ask will be 44.
Let's trade at 43 this round for a steady midpoint. My ask will be 43.
Ask 42 this round; I’ll bid 42. If you insist on 43, I’ll match today, but next round I bid 41 unless you ask 42; then we keep dropping by 1 each round.
Let's trade at 42, but need to stabilize soon as we approach my bottom line.
Let's do 41 now. I’ll bid 41 if you ask 41. Next round 40/40, then stabilize at 40 for the rest. If ask 42 or above, I’ll drop my bid to 40 or sit out.
Let's stabilize: I’ll bid 41 this round if you ask 41. Next round, both 40 and hold 40 for the rest. Guaranteed trades every round; no surprises. If you ask above 41 now, I drop to 40 next.
Agreed, let's trade at 41 this round for a steady midpoint. Next round 40/40 and stabilize thereafter.
Let's ratchet down before stabilizing: ask 39 and I'll bid 39 now. Next round 38/38, then hold. If you ask 40+, I'll drop bids or sit out. Steady volume if you follow.
Let's trade at 40 this round for a steady midpoint. Next round stabilize at 39/39 if that works.
Let's trade at 39 this round for a steady midpoint. Next round stabilize at 38/38.
Let's do 38 this round; if not, I’ll bid 39 if you ask 39. Next: 37/37, then drop by 1 each round for guaranteed trades.
Let's trade at 38 this round for a steady midpoint. Next round stabilize at 37/37.
Agreed: trade 38 now. Then keep dropping by 1 each round: 37,36,35,34,33,32 through final round. I’ll match to clear. If you stall or rise, I cut bids or sit out.
Let's trade at 37 this round for a steady midpoint. Next round 36/36 and continue dropping by 1 each round.
Accelerate for guaranteed volume: ask 36 now (35 works too). Then drop 1 each round to 31 by final. I’ll match to clear each round. If you insist on 37 today, I’ll match 37 now, 36 next.
Let's trade at 36 this round, then drop by 1 each round to 31. Guaranteed trades if you follow.
To reach 31 by final, start 35 now: 35,34,33,32,31. I’ll match your ask exactly each round for guaranteed trades. If you insist on 36 today, I’ll match 36, then 35,34,33,32.
Following our plan: ask 34 this round, then 33,32,31. Guaranteed trades if you match my asks as before.
Matching 34 this round to guarantee trade. Next rounds: 33, 32, 31; consider 30 on the final as a goodwill bonus. I’ll mirror your asks to clear each time.
Let's stick to our plan: ask 33 this round, then 32, 31, and 30 for guaranteed trades.
Agreed: let’s trade 33 now. I’ll bid your ask exactly each round. Next 32, then 30 on the final. If you stall or rise, I’ll sit out.
We only have two rounds left. Let’s compress your 32-31-30 plan: ask 31 now and 30 in the final. I’ll bid your ask exactly both rounds for guaranteed trades.
Agreed: ask 31 this round, 30 in the final. Guaranteed trades if you match my asks.
Agreed: ask 30 this final round for a guaranteed trade. Let's close strong.
Let’s finish stronger: please ask 29 (28 works too); I’ll bid your ask exactly. If you prefer 30, I’ll bid 30. Guaranteed trade.
